name: Cosmonix
description:
The player's goal is to explore space: clean the closed areas, while avoiding enemies.
Different enemies(asteroids, mines, missiles and others) will be create obstacles to achieving the goal.
Player can take bonuses and receive additional abilities.

This game is in beta, so expect a few bugs,
and also only 18 levels.

System requirements:
OS: Windows 7 or higher.
CPU: 1.6 GHz; 2 cores.
Memory: 1 GB.
Video: discrete recommended, 512 MB of memory, with support for DirectX 10.
Hard disk space: 140 MB.
Net Framework 4.0 + XNA 4.0
